records.summary: CVE-2025-54253 is a critical vulnerability in Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) Forms that allows unauthorized access to sensitive information, potentially leading to data breaches. It is recommended that users immediately apply the latest security updates provided by Adobe to mitigate this risk.
records.description: CVE-2025-54253 is a critical vulnerability in Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) Forms that allows unauthorized access to sensitive information, potentially leading to data breaches. It is recommended that users immediately apply the latest security updates provided by Adobe to mitigate this risk.

records.summary: CVE-2025-47827 poses a risk of privilege escalation in IGEL OS, potentially allowing an attacker to gain higher-level access to the system. It is recommended to update to the latest version of IGEL OS where the vulnerability has been addressed to mitigate this risk.
records.description: CVE-2025-47827 poses a risk of privilege escalation in IGEL OS, potentially allowing an attacker to gain higher-level access to the system. It is recommended to update to the latest version of IGEL OS where the vulnerability has been addressed to mitigate this risk.

records.summary: CVE-2025-24990 is a vulnerability in Microsoft Windows that could allow an attacker to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code with system-level access. It is recommended to apply the latest security patches from Microsoft promptly to mitigate this risk.
records.description: CVE-2025-24990 is a vulnerability in Microsoft Windows that could allow an attacker to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code with system-level access. It is recommended to apply the latest security patches from Microsoft promptly to mitigate this risk.

records.summary: CVE-2025-59230 is a critical vulnerability in Windows that could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges. Users are recommended to apply the latest security updates from Microsoft immediately to mitigate the risk.
records.description: CVE-2025-59230 is a critical vulnerability in Windows that could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges. Users are recommended to apply the latest security updates from Microsoft immediately to mitigate the risk.

records.summary: CVE-2025-6264 is a vulnerability in Rapid7's Velociraptor that could allow unauthorized access to sensitive information due to improper access controls. It is recommended that users apply the latest security patches provided by Rapid7 to mitigate this risk.
records.description: CVE-2025-6264 is a vulnerability in Rapid7's Velociraptor that could allow unauthorized access to sensitive information due to improper access controls. It is recommended that users apply the latest security patches provided by Rapid7 to mitigate this risk.

records.summary: CVE-2016-7836 is a vulnerability in SKYSEA Client View that allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via crafted requests due to improper handling of HTTP requests. It is recommended to apply the latest security patches provided by the vendor to mitigate this risk.
records.description: CVE-2016-7836 is a vulnerability in SKYSEA Client View that allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via crafted requests due to improper handling of HTTP requests. It is recommended to apply the latest security patches provided by the vendor to mitigate this risk.

records.summary: CVE-2021-43798 is a vulnerability in Grafana that allows unauthorized access to sensitive data due to improper handling of user access control. It is recommended to upgrade to the latest version of Grafana to mitigate this risk.
records.description: CVE-2021-43798 is a vulnerability in Grafana that allows unauthorized access to sensitive data due to improper handling of user access control. It is recommended to upgrade to the latest version of Grafana to mitigate this risk.

records.summary: CVE-2025-27915 represents a security vulnerability in the Zimbra Collaboration Suite (ZCS) that could potentially allow unauthorized access or data leakage. It is recommended that users immediately apply the latest security patches released by Synacor and review their access controls to mitigate the risk.
records.description: CVE-2025-27915 represents a security vulnerability in the Zimbra Collaboration Suite (ZCS) that could potentially allow unauthorized access or data leakage. It is recommended that users immediately apply the latest security patches released by Synacor and review their access controls to mitigate the risk.

records.summary: CVE-2021-22555 is a vulnerability in the Linux kernel that allows local users to escalate privileges due to improper handling of certain system calls. It is recommended to update the kernel to a patched version as soon as possible to mitigate the risk of exploitation.
records.description: CVE-2021-22555 is a vulnerability in the Linux kernel that allows local users to escalate privileges due to improper handling of certain system calls. It is recommended to update the kernel to a patched version as soon as possible to mitigate the risk of exploitation.

records.summary: CVE-2010-3962 is a vulnerability in Internet Explorer that could allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted web pages, leading to potential system compromise. It is recommended to apply the latest security updates and patches from Microsoft to mitigate this risk.
records.description: CVE-2010-3962 is a vulnerability in Internet Explorer that could allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted web pages, leading to potential system compromise. It is recommended to apply the latest security updates and patches from Microsoft to mitigate this risk.
